text: Micromonospora viridifaciens is an endophytic actinomycete, with type strain DSM 43909T. == References == ==Further reading== * * * * * * * ==External links== * *LPSN *Type strain of Micromonospora viridifaciens at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Micromonosporineae Category:Bacteria described in 2005
title: Micromonospora viridifaciens
